definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
The Nine Chapters on the Mathematical Art

sentences.english: I still tend to move my fingers, almost subconsciously, when doing arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 当做算术时，几乎是下意识的，我还是会想去掰手指。

sentences.english: It is ordinary arithmetic that the stronger will win, so why fight?
sentences.chinese: 强者会胜是一种很普通的算术，那为什么争斗？

sentences.english: It's the first thing they should teach you after arithmetic, in grade school.
sentences.chinese: 这是你在学校学完基本算术后的紧接着的课。

sentences.english: Aim To define a new arithmetical function and study its value distribution properties.
sentences.chinese: 目的定义一个新的算术函数，并研究它的值分布性质。

sentences.english: Everyone learns the rudiments of arithmetic in elementary school.
sentences.chinese: 在小学，每个人都学习入门算术。

sentences.english: Middle rate is the arithmetic average rate of buying rate and selling rate, used for inter-bank.
sentences.chinese: 中间汇率是买入汇率和卖出汇率的算术平均数。

sentences.english: A regular system (of number-words) also makes arithmetic clearer to understand.
sentences.chinese: 数字的规律系统也让算术更加清晰易懂。

sentences.english: So for numbers, we have the things you'd expect, the arithmetics.
sentences.chinese: 对于数字来说，我们已经掌握了你们希望掌握的算术。

sentences.english: Conclusion The relevant research work of classical arithmetical function was developed.
sentences.chinese: 结论发展了经典的算术函数的相关研究工作。

sentences.english: In a sense, arithmatic is a language.
sentences.chinese: 某种意义上来讲，算术是一种语言。

sentences.english: I am then doing some mathematics with it, clearly, based on the below.
sentences.chinese: 我用它来做一些算术，显然地，根据下面的。

sentences.english: You do the math correctly, increment returns.
sentences.chinese: 你正确地做了算术，increment返回。

sentences.english: You know I would rather visit the dentist than study algebra and arithmetic!
sentences.chinese: 你知道我宁肯去看牙医也不愿意学习代数和算术。

sentences.english: Arithmetic coding is a relatively new loss-less data compression technique that has attracted much attention in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种利用算术编码实现数据加密的算法。

sentences.english: That school puts particular emphasis on arithmetic and reading.
sentences.chinese: 那所学校侧重算术和阅读。

sentences.english: Then he did the math from the dates noted.
sentences.chinese: 然后他根据上面的日期做了个算术。

definition: four rules of arithmetic/addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
to know how to count and do sums/numerate/numeracy
to count numbers/to keep to one's word/to hold (i.e. to remain valid)/to count (i.e. to be important)
The Nine Chapters on the Mathematical Art
mental arithmetic/to calculate in one's head/planning/preparation
to do a sum in writing/written calculation
to compute on the abacus/(fig.) to calculate/to plan/to scheme
